name: My First Songs 2
description:
You can now enjoy My First Songs 2, the interactive music game for kids. My First Songs 2 features a new playlist of 14 popular children’s songs as well as gorgeous 3D animations.

Sing along and interact by popping bubble notes: try to catch them all!

My First Songs 2 features:

  • 14 popular children’s songs
  • Lots of animals

Playlist:

  • Head Shoulders Knees and Toes
  • Deck the Hall
  • Ten Little Indians
  • Hey Diddle Diddle
  • Humpty Dumpty
  • If You’re Happy and You Know It
  • Little Miss Muffet
  • Pop Goes the Weasel
  • Row, Row, Row Your Boat
  • The Muffin Man
  • The Wheel on the Bus
  • We Wish You A Merry Christmas
  • Little Bo Peep
  • Oh Where Has My Little Dog Gone
